title: Sucked In
description: Ashley Hawn, an author of sappy vampire romance novels, suddenly finds herself face-to-face with one. The vampire, her out-of-her-league boyfriend, turns her and abandons her to the world of the supernatural, which until now she thought was make believe. 	Ashely is battered about, trying desperately to figure out why she was turned and why every supernatural group wants her. Slowly, the truth of who she is and why she was turned reveals itself.
author: Charissa Dufour
